idea:
Established from a team of HVAC engineers with more than 35 years of experience in HVAC, we have state of the art factory with 30,000 Sq.ft which has all machineries from the best manufacturers across the globe. With our expertise in HVAC industry we can cater all your requirements for finned type heat exchangers that are commonly used in HVAC equipment’s such as Cooling Coils, Heating Coils, Direct Expansion Coils, Condenser Coils, FCU Coils, Steam Coils, Run Around Coils, Reversible Coils, etc. In addition to OEM customer’s we can also cater to replacement market, which can be single or multiple coils for Air Cooled Chillers, Air Handlers, Package unit, or any other large sized Air Conditioning Equipment.


Quality

All our products are manufactured under stringent Quality Inspection Procedures as per our Quality Management System – ISO 9001:2015, which ensures inspection right from the inward inspection of raw materials, followed by stage wise inspection during manufacturing & final inspection post manufacturing to meet our customers requirements.


Our Technical Strength

With our inhouse design team & with the support of our customized coil design software, you can rely on us to develop any coils to meet the design conditions. With required design conditions, our software can calculate the required number of Rows, the Required Fin Spacing (FPI), the number of Circuits, Header Size. It will also get the other technical data’s such as Air Side Pressure Drop, Media Pressure Drops, Total & Sensible Capacity ,SHR, Flow rate, Velocity , etc. Upon satisfactory approval from customers our engineers will prepare the AutoCad drawings & get it for your approval, post which manufacturing is initiated, which guarantees that products manufactured meets your expectations. In case of replacement coils, within India we can send in our engineer to site who will gather coil data & then we will manufacture the same replica or a modified one to meet the requirements which will guarantee enhanced performance.


Packing

We understand the value of your investment in our quality products & hence to take extra care during transit of our products while it reaches you in best quality as manufactured, we ensure that all coils are packed in Cage Palletized packing or Box Packing with additional insulation material as protection on the exposed coil fin surface area specially at extreme end coils, inside the pallet. For export worthy shipments, regulations of destination country is followed such as use of Fumigated Timber or Fumigation post packing to ensure local compliance.


Logistics

With our inhouse logistics team, you can be assured to have our products delivered as door delivered either as Full Truck Load or Part Load for our Indian customers & as LCL or FCL Shipments for our export customers with delivery terms as Ex-Works, FOB, CNF, CFR, CIF across any major ports globally.


Why Shelton?

With all our major raw materials being sourced locally , all the New Generation Machineries we use for our various process involved in manufacturing & with our highly experienced and skilled workforce , rest you can be assured that we will be able to remain committed to our shortest delivery schedules, to ensure that we remain your trusted & reliable business partner for all your coil requirements.

 

Our Products

 Chilled Water Coils

 Hot Water Coils

 Direct Expansion (DX) Coils

 Condenser Coils

 Evaporator Coils

 FCU Coils

 Steam Coils

 Run Around Coils

 Reversible Coils
name: SHELTON HVAC PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
CHS Technologies takes a holistic approach towards “Healthcare to all”, and “Make in India” initiative. With the use of ICT, we have conceptualized “CHS HealthSuite” as a product suite that breaks down the barriers between patients, providers (various departments) and payers. Our concept is fundamentally rooted in the belief that everyone involved in patient care and management needs to have appropriate access to a 360-degree view of the patient.

With the advent of Digital India and e-Governance, our HeathSuite provides providers, patients and in some cases, payers real time access to data relevant to a patient’s care continuum. We have combined the best practices involving Financial management, Business Operations, Human Resources Management, Information Management, Organizational Governance, Patient Care Systems, Quality Management, and Risk Management into a single software solution - CHS HealthSuite.

CHS HealthSuite brings various functionalities of Gold Standards under one umbrella - Right from doctor and department search, patient engagement chatbots, AADHAR linked patient appointments and tracking, multi-channel patient communications, identification of Medico-Legal cases by MO, electronic labs order/reports, electronic submissions of pharmacy prescriptions, both in and out maintenance of inventories and medicines, charges related to the services provided etc.
name: CHS TECHNOLOGIES LLP
